headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Business Center user that you want to revoke the access to the asset from. You can obtain the Business Center user ID via user_id returned by /bc/member/get/ .

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: Asset type. Enum values: CATALOG , ADVERTISER , LEAD , TT_ACCOUNT (corresponds to BC_AUTH_TT , and learn more from Identities ).

parameters.name: asset_id
parameters.description: Asset ID. If the asset_type is ADVERTISER , this is the advertiser ID. If the asset_type is CATALOG , this is the catalog ID.
